Hey!

We are a small ISP in Priština, Republic of Kosovo. We operate our own datacenter and ASN (AS57891). As a company we specialise in providing internet and IPTV. For business customers we provide Virtual servers and Dedicated servers. Recently we have decided to expand our services even to the LowEnd market and we have created an offer for all of you great people.


**Starter**

1 CPU Core

10 GB HDD

512 MB RAM

1 Gbit/s Unmetered Port (Shared)

KVM Virtualisation

$5.00 per month


[Order here!](https://my.balkanvps.eu/cart.php?a=add&pid=1)

Our network consists of peering by Artmotion and backup peering from IPKO. At the moment we offer 1Gbit/s unmetered shared connection on all of our services but if you require something more special we can make you a deal on dedicated bandwidth! At the moment we are improving our network to 10 Gigabit/s and this will soon be available.


All of our services are semi managed, we are happy to help our customers with whatever issue you may encounter within reason, we may charge a small fee if the task is a little outside of the "semi-managed" scope. We also provide specialised media (mostly video) streaming and transcoding services - if you are interested please message us we can sort something out!

Thanks!
